I agree @dalgoda. Now what would you do if your friends were under constant, vicious, lying attack from anonymous bullies?

This troll, we'll call him Bruce, won't stop until TWiT is dead and buried. @crpietschmann He's literally trying to put us out of business.
I hate to do this @crpietschmann but after bomb threats, continuous harassment of family, sponsors, and staff I need to do something.

 #talksm

A16) I think the leader I most admire now is Bill Gates, but not for his business acumen, for his philanthropy. #talksm

A14) Social media is just the latest flavor - there's always something new. It's a mistake to chase the fad. Create the next fad.  #talksm
